root.name: Splashdown
root.description: Players race through several exotic courses in many different locations on jet skis while passing buoys along the way. If they pass on the wrong side of a buoy, the jet ski may stall, slowing them down temporarily. Soundtrack"The Rock Show" - Blink 182"Hit or Miss" - New Found Glory"Hold Your Breath" - Otis"All Star" - Smash Mouth"Right Now" - SR-71"All She's Got" - Sum 41"Rhythms" - Sum 41"You've Got A Crush On Me" - The Donnas"Rock Da Juice" - The Dude"Chupa Cabra" - The Groovie Ghoulies"Gaceland" - The Groovie Ghoulies
